text: Clubul Sportiv Gilortul Târgu Cărbunești, commonly known as Gilortul Târgu Cărbunești, is a Romanian professional football club from Târgu Cărbunești, Gorj County. ==Honours== Liga IV – Gorj County *Winners (8): 1990–91, 1997–98, 1998–99, 2004–05, 2013–14, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2018–19 *Runners-up (1): 2012–13 Cupa României – Gorj County *Winners (2): 2013–14, 2014–15 *Runners-up (1): 2012–13 ==Current squad== } ==Club officials== ===Board of directors=== {| class="toccolours" |- ! style="background:#318CE7;color:#FFFFFF;border:1px solid #000000;" |Role ! style="background:#318CE7;color:#FFFFFF;border:1px solid #000000;" |Role |- | Owner | Târgu Cărbunești Town |- | President | Silviu Ungureanu |- | Organizer of Competitions | Irinel Poșircă |} ===Current technical staff=== {| class="toccolours" |- ! style="background:#318CE7;color:#FFFFFF;border:1px solid #000000;" |Role ! style="background:#318CE7;color:#FFFFFF;border:1px solid #000000;" |Role |- | Manager | Mario Găman |- | Assistant Manager | Dan Staicu |- | Club Doctor | Mariana Tomulescu |} ==League history== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" !
